content.rendered:
Term Dates

Autumn Term 2024

Monday 2nd and Tuesday 3rd September 2024: Teacher Training Days (No school for pupils)

Wednesday 4th September 2024: Pupils return to School

Monday 28th October to Friday 1st November 2024: Half Term

Monday 4th November 2024: Pupils return to school

Friday 20th December 2024: Term Ends (2:15pm finish for pupils)

Spring Term 2025

Monday 6th January 2025: Pupils return to school

Monday 17th to Friday 21st February 2025: Half Term

Monday 24th & Tuesday 25th February 2025: Teacher Training Days (No school for pupils)

Wednesday 26th February 2025: Pupils return to school

Friday 11th April 2025: Term Ends (2:15pm finish for pupils)

Summer Term 2025

Monday 28th April 2025: Pupils return to school

Friday 2nd May 2025: Teacher Training Day (No school for pupils)

Monday 5th May 2025: May Bank Holiday

Tuesday 6th May 2025: Pupils return to school

Monday 26th May 2025 to Friday 30th May 2025: Half Term

Monday 2nd June 2025 : Teacher Training Day (No school for pupils)

Tuesday 3rd June 2025: Pupils return to school

Friday 18th July 2025: Term Ends (2:15pm finish for pupils)

This information will be subject to change. Notifications of significant changes will be sent via text or email, as appropriate. For school information, news and updates about events, please refer to the calendar and other notices on this website.
